body:
Comment 10 by **linuxhacker100**: 
I added issue #512 which was later merged into this one. It states another problem
which needs to be addressed. In what format should we hold nanoseconds?
time.Nanoseconds() returns an int64 while os.Dir.Mtime is a uint64. That is another
example of where time data is handled inconsistently, but it is also a different
problem from this issue report.
